channel.title: r, rtistry, generative art on Nicola Rennie
channel.description: Recent content in r, rtistry, generative art on Nicola Rennie

item.title: Best (artistic) practices in R
item.description: What is generative art? Generative art is the process of creating artwork through a set of pre-determined rules often with an element of randomness. It is often termed rtistry or aRt when the art is created using the programming language R. In October 2021, I started experimenting with generative art, and developed a R package. I also took part in #genuary2022, the challenge running in the month of January where generative artists create art based on a different prompt each day.
